name: AMAppleScriptAction
desc: An object that represents Automator actions whose runtime behavior is driven by an AppleScript script. DeprecatedUse the Cocoa-AppleScript template (an instance of AMBundleAction) in Xcode to create AppleScript-based Automator actions.
